note.p: Clergyman, philosopher, and inspector of schools. Congregational minister, Gosport, 1842–5. His Historical and critical view of the speculative philosophy of Europe in the nineteenth century (1846) led to his appointment as inspector of schools, a post which he held from 1848 until 1876. Published numerous works on grammar and philosophy.
